member.name: T:AbatabLogging.BuildContent
member.summary: Logic for building log file content.

member.name: M:AbatabLogging.BuildContent.LogComponents(System.String,AbatabData.Session,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Builds the content for a log file.
member.param: The type of log to create.
Information/data for this session of Abatab.
The log message.
The name of executing assembly.
The filename of where the log is coming from.
The method name of where the log is coming from.
The file line of where the log is coming from.
member.returns: The completed content for a log file.

The debug log message.

The method name of where the log is coming from.
The file line of where the log is coming from.
member.returns: The completed content for a debug log file.
